entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets early this evening. Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this evening then changing to snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
